description:
Say goodbye to stripped T-nuts. The Magic Nuts screw in place to resist spinning when you tighten the bolts on your climbing holds.

  • Made of zinc-coated steel
  • Accepts 3/8in. bolts
  • Fits in 17/32in. or 9/16in. drill holes
  • Screws not included
name: Binary Holds Magic Nuts - 100 Pack
